messages.subject: Only 3 weeks left for Early Bird Discount for UWG conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! Early Bird registration for the Unschoolers Waterpark Gathering in Sandusky, Ohio, is only $35 until October 31st! That s $35 for your entire
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone!

Early Bird registration for the Unschoolers' Waterpark Gathering in Sandusky, Ohio, is only $35 until October 31st! That's $35 for your entire family! If you register and reserve your room before October 31st, you will also receive a $20 gift card, $20 arcade card and free mini golf passes from the Kalahari Resort!

The purpose of the Unschoolers' Waterpark Gathering is to facilitate and inspire a sense of unity, connection and community in an environment that is safe, nurturing and fun for all unschooling
families.

The next UWG will be February 3-8, 2013 at the Kalahari Waterpark Resort, Sandusky, Ohio.

Join us for our unprecedented sixth year. Our 2013 theme is
"Have Fun, Learn Stuff, Grow" with keynote speaker David Albert.

See our website for details and to register: www.unschoolerswaterparkgathering.com
You can also check us out on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/uwginfo/

Hope to see you all there!

Kim Lowery
2013 UWG Main Events Coordinator
